Package course.examples.spacesaver

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Constants
    Interface containing a few constants used by other classes in the package Created by kannanb on 3/29/2016.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BmpData
    Wrapper class to hold the path to an image file and its bitmap
    ImageAdapter
    Class for rendering a set of images passed to it.
    ImageViewer
    Activity class to render a single image in an Image View alongwith its path on the local storage Created by kannanb on 3/14/2016.
    MainActivity
    Activity class containing widgets for user to control space savings on the device storage
    Pair
    Wrapper class containing absolute path to source image and the compressed image
    Created by kannanb on 3/8/2016.
    SpaceSaverService
    Service class for constantly monitoring the disk usage and compress images to bring the free space below the threshold defined by the user
    Created by kannanb on 4/11/2016.
    SpaceServiceReceiver
    Class for automatically starting the SpaceSaverService on device boot
    Created by kannanb on 4/11/2016.
    StatsActivity  
    Utility
    Utility class containing reusable and independent stateless methods to be used by other class in the package
    Created by kannanb on 3/7/2016.
    Utility.ImageCompressTask
    Class to perform the image compression operation in a background thread
